definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[לאך]] (√ of [[מַלְאָח]] [[מְלָאכָה]], cf. Ar. la0’ay, la0’a0h;un send, la0’aka messenger, Eth. 0’al0’aka send a messenger, v. tal0k: be sent, wait on, minister; mal0ak: = Heb. [[מַלְאָח]]; cf. Ph. [[מלאך]] messenger; NH [[מַלְאָח]] Aram. [[מַלְאֲכָא]], as in Heb.)
